certificates_section_1_content: Share your Certificate and make your profile more visible.
certificates_section_2_header: YOUR PROGRESS WITH اللِّسَانُ العَرَبِيُّ IS CERTIFICATED
certificates_section_2_content: Your progress with our Arabic course is certificated. Our course gives you a path to learning through 144 units and 6 levels. You’ll take a quiz to assess your progress at the end of each unit. You’ll get a certificate upon completion of each level. You can share it on LinkedIn.
certificates_section_3_header: THESE ARE OUR CERTIFICATES YOU CAN GET
certificates_section_4_header: Sign up now and start learning Arabic
